cable_centrifugal_{SIDE}.name: Centrifugal Sprinkler Signal Cable ({ENG[SIDE]})
notes: Runs through the M{ARM_BACK[SIDE]} arm centrifugal spray boom/lance
Terminal connecting to centrifugal motor is exposed to spray mist

cable_esc_arm_m{ARM_FRONT}.name: M{SAME[ARM_FRONT]} Aircraft Arm ESC Composite Cable
cable_esc_arm_m{ARM_FRONT}.name_spanish: Cable de ESC del Brazo M{SAME[ARM_FRONT]}
cable_esc_arm_m{ARM_FRONT}.material_name: M1 & M2 Aircraft Arm ESC Composite Cable

cable_esc_arm_m{ARM_BACK}.name: M{SAME[ARM_BACK]} Aircraft Arm ESC Composite Cable
cable_esc_arm_m{ARM_BACK}.name_spanish: Cable de ESC del Brazo M{SAME[ARM_BACK]}
cable_esc_arm_m{ARM_BACK}.material_name: M3 & M4 Aircraft Arm ESC Composite Cable

cable_esc_front_power_{SIDE}.name: Front Aircraft Arm ESC Power Adapter Cable ({ENG[SIDE]})
cable_esc_front_power_{SIDE}.name_spanish: Cable Adaptador de Potencia del Brazo Delantero ({SPA[SIDE]})
cable_esc_front_power_{SIDE}.material_name: Front Aircraft Arm ESC Power Adapter Cable
notes: Runs through the {ENG_LOWER[SIDE]} side of the drone's frame

cable_pump.name: Impeller Pump Signal Cable
notes: Y-shaped cable. Large socket connects to board_spray_adaptive, smaller sockets connect to each of the two pumps.
Terminals connecting to pumps are exposed to spray mist

cable_radar_bwd.name: Backward Vision Radar Signal Cable
cable_radar_bwd.name_spanish: Cable de Radar de Visión Trasera
notes: Runs through the left side of the drone's frame
Long USB-C cable with female terminals
Terminal with rubber cover connects to radar

cable_radar_omni.name: Omnidirectional Radar Signal Cable
notes: Short USB-C cable with female terminals

cable_rtk_{SIDE}.name: RTK Coaxial Cable ({ENG[SIDE]})
notes: Runs through the {ENG_LOWER[SIDE]} side of the drone's frame

cable_signal_{SIDE}.name: Signal Cable ({ENG[SIDE]})
notes: Runs through the {ENG_LOWER[SIDE]} side of the drone's frame

cable_spray_adaptive.name: Spraying Adaptive Cable
notes: Carries the same signals as the Spraying Signal Cable

cable_spray_signal.name: Spraying Signal Cable
notes: Carries the same signals as the Spraying Adaptive Cable
